column2: Base: Those in receipt of Universal Credit or Child Tax Credit, at 2 April 2022
Universal Credit figures are for GB only (as DWP do not administer Universal Credit in Northern Ireland), whereas the Child Tax Credit figures are on a UK basis
Figures are rounded to the nearest 10 and may not sum due to rounding
Low numbers including zero are suppressed in accordance with disclosure rules
A number of households have exemptions in more than one category, they are counted once in each appropriate category and only once in the total
1 Region/Local Authority derived from claimant residential address, not present in Universal Credit data source for all households
